articles.title: James Webb telescope measures the starlight around the universe's biggest, oldest black holes for 1st time ever - Livescience.com
articles.description: Astronomers using the James Webb Space Telescope have separated the light of a quasar from the light of its surrounding stars, offering unprecedented insight into how the universe's oldest black holes grew.
